meanings.definition: A person who drinks alcohol excessively.
meanings.sent1: The boozehound at the party finished all the beer in record time.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is known as the family boozehound because he always has a drink in his hand.
meanings.sent3: The boozehound tried to convince everyone that drinking ten shots in a row was a good idea.
meanings.sent4: After a long day at work, he transformed into a boozehound, seeking solace in a bottle of whiskey.
meanings.sent5: The image of a boozehound with bloodshot eyes and a staggering gait is hard to forget.

meanings.sent1: She tends to boozehound whenever she's feeling stressed out.
meanings.sent2: If you boozehound every night, it can have a negative impact on your health.
meanings.sent3: He decided to boozehound his way through the weekend, much to his liver's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The group of friends boozehounded their way through the entire bar's supply of tequila.
meanings.sent5: As the stress piled up, he found himself boozehounding more frequently, losing control of his drinking habits.
